name: Deadly Moment
description:
Deadly Moment is a game that focus on creating strategic options for action combat. The game is still on development. 

=========================================================

To do list:

1.Adding more combat elements to emphasize the theme

2.Better map design

3.UI

4.More difficult AI and Bosses

5.Animation fixing

6.VFX like hit stop

7.more playable characters

===============================================================

Hold the keyboard button and click the mouse to play the game.

Space: Move
Z: Slash
X:Shoot
C:Guard

Dash 2 grid after guard or 2 Slash.
